original_text: During the night Jacob took with him his two wives, his two female servants and his eleven sons. They went across the Jabbok river where there was a place to cross.
korean_text: 밤에 일어나 두 아내와 두 여종과 열한 아들을 인도하여 얍복 나루를 건널새

sentences.original_text: During the night Jacob took with him his two wives
sentences.korean_translation: 밤에 야곱은 그의 두 아내를 데리고

sentences.original_text: his two female servants and his eleven sons
They went across the Jabbok river
where there was a place to cross
